attributes.action: get the ABC (australian broadcasting corporation) to give the BBC the rights to show chasers war on everything
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the chasers war on everything is a very funny satirical australian program which pokes fun at stupid things about life and things which annoy us as well as controversial issues

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
